game.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara는 Capcom의 두 가지 고전 아케이드 히트작인 Dungeons & Dragons: Tower of Doom과 Dungeons & Dragons: Shadow over Mystara를 하나의 디지털 패키지로 재구현한 것입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara brings reworkings of two of Capcom’s classic arcade hits - Dungeons & Dragons: Tower of Doom and Dungeons & Dragons: Shadow over Mystara – together in one definitive digital package.

reviewHighlights.text: D&D Tower of Doom (one of two games in this pack) was a personal favorite of mine as an arcade game of the 1990s. This pack did not port well to 1080p...
fun little game but not something i see myself coming back to much unless someone i know wants to play
